photo.description: Lots of renovation going on in Beijing at this time. One of the main areas of The Forbidden City, The Hall of Supreme Harmony, is also under repair. Thankfully they put a big picture there so we can see what it should look like.

photo.description: The path along the center line of the Forbidden City is paved in marble, and has ornately carved stairs leading up and down from the major buildings. These slabs were hauled from miles outside Beijing and are carved with intertwined dragons and phoenixes.
photo.tags: forbidden city beijing china palace hall supreme harmony steps carving dragon stairs 太和殿
photo.title: The Emporer's Path
